basics.name: Benny Trieu
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Hello, my name is Benny. I am an undergraduate studying for a Computer Science degree at University of Hawaii at Manoa. I plan to graduate on spring 2023.

courses: Intro to Computer Science I & II (ICS 111 & ICS 211)

work.company: University of Hawaii at Manoa - Hamilton Library
work.position: Info Tech - DNS Computer & Network Support Specialist
work.summary: Part-time IT technician for Hamilton Library
highlights: Installation of hardware and software for university students and library staff to utilize
Assistance with library staff's technological issues
Recorded shortages, discrepancies, and information of the library's inventory

work.summary: Internship on Kihei, Maui working on webserver
highlights: Changing the layout to an accordion collapse
Fixed an issue with users not appearing on the web server
Adding graphs onto the web server

work.summary: Part-time Crew member for the Mcdonald's company
highlights: Delivered prompt, friendly customer service by documenting orders
Assisted other staff by ensuring all stations are well-supplied
Followed food safety and sanitation procedures in line with the company’s standards

Activities.organization: University of Hawaii at Manoa Game Dev Club
Activities.summary: Help encourage students in the game development career path
highlights: Organized Unity/Unreal workshops on how to use the software
Held Meetings and collaborated with others on the development of the project
Prepared meeting logs and recorded attendance

Activities.summary: Help promote physical activity to kids
highlights: Constructed the booth with other volunteers
Encourage kids to sign up for tennis lessons
Distributed the prizes to participating kids

Activities.summary: Nurture and help educate the children in the environment
highlights: Maintained and reorganized the environment to uphold the company’s friendly culture and reputation
Supervised and interacted with children to ensure their safety in order to maintain a safe, positive environment
Developed friendly relationships with children’s parents by providing directions and customer support when needed

awards.title: Charles R Hemenway Scholarship
awards.summary: Awarded for having a minimum GPA of 2.0, having good citizenship, and by being enrolled to University of Hawaii at Manoa as a full time student

awards.title: Hawaii Veterans Memorial Scholarship
awards.summary: Awarded for having a minimum GPA of 2.0, having good citizenship, and by being enrolled to University of Hawaii at Manoa as a full time student

awards.title: Hawaii B Plus State Scholarship
awards.summary: Awarded for having a high school GPA of 3.0, being a full time student, and a hawaii resident

awards.title: Most Inspirational Athlete
awards.summary: This was awarded as a sign of showing the most improvement and hard effort in the team. This medal was awarded to me since I have improved a lot in my senior year of Tennis and have put in a lot of time and effort in my tennis season.

awards.title: Akamai 2023 Internship Completion Certificate
awards.summary: Awarded for completing the Akamai Internship Program from June 2022 to August 2022
